short_summary: Provide food services for meal preparation in DND culinary facilities
description: PWGSC, on behalf of department of Nationale Defence (DND), is issuing this request for proposal (RFP) for food services for meal preparation in DND culinary facilities, Valcartier, Qc \\u2013 VIMY CAMP as detailed in Annex Statement of work.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP)

## Tender Number and Title
W0106-23P006: Food Services for Meal Preparation in DND Culinary Facilities

## Background

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for food services for meal preparation in DND culinary facilities located at Valcartier, Quebec, specifically at the Vimy Camp.

## Tender Details

* **Tender Number**: W0106-23P006
* **Tender Title**: Food Services for Meal Preparation in DND Culinary Facilities
* **Publication Date**: April 8, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 2, 2024, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)
* **Modification Date**: April 22, 2024
* **Contract Start Date**: To be determined
* **Contract End Date**: To be determined
* **Tender Status**: Expired

## Service Description

The RFP seeks proposals for food services for meal preparation in DND culinary facilities, including but not limited to, meal planning, food procurement, food preparation, serving, and cleanup.

## Evaluation Criteria

* **Price**: The lowest price proposal will be considered the most responsive to the RFP requirements.

## Pre-Qualification Requirements

There are no pre-qualification requirements.

## Notice and Solicitation

* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Trade Agreements

This RFP is subject to the provisions of the following trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-EU Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)

## Contact Information

For additional information, please contact:
Julie Carbonneau, PSPC/SPAC
julie.carbonneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: all administrative and technical inquiries should be directed to the contact above.

I have removed irrelevant information and reproduced all information in a concise and clear manner.
